data.eml:eml: Genera of Gymnodamaeidae (Acari: Oribatida: Plateremaeoidea) of Canada, with notes on some nomenclatorial problems

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Walter, David Evans (2009): Genera of Gymnodamaeidae (Acari: Oribatida: Plateremaeoidea) of Canada, with notes on some nomenclatorial problems. Zootaxa 2206: 23-44, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.189740
